title: PlayStation 5 is Getting a Price Increase - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.25.22
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about PS5's prince increase in most major markets, Horizon Zero Dawn's TV show, and Elden Ring's publisher securing its partnerships.

Go to http://meundies.com/kindafunny to get 20% off your first order plus free shipping.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:54 - Housekeeping
PS I Love You XOXO is recording after this with special guest, Sancho West! And we need your help. We’re talking about the future of Last of Us and we want your input. Write into Patreon.com/KindaFunnyGames and let us know where you want The Last of Us to go OR any questions you have about the future of the franchise. And we’ll talk about it on PS I Love You XOXO this week.
ICYMI: A new Kinda Funny Xcast is up right now and the crew has gotten to check out Obsidian’s upcoming game Pentiment. That’s up on Youtube.com/KindaFUnnyGames and podcast services around the globe.
The Roper Report   -
00:09:33 - The PS5 is about to get more expensive
00:21:19 - The Horizon tv show is being developed by the guy behind Umbrella Academy
00:31:37 - Ad
00:32:38 - Bandai Namco is ‘working to secure IP and partnerships’ amid all these acquisitions
00:36:16 - Pokemon Masters Update
00:38:25 - PSVR 2s are gonna be at TGS
00:42:26 - Some fun Gamescom analytics from Benji sales on Twitter!
00:47:00 - Knockout City Season 7 stars the Ninja Turtles
00:53:20 - Out today
00:54:39 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Gary
